title: LFX Mentorship 2023 Summer
description: One student from the club namely Eshaan Agarwal got accepted as mentee in LFX Mentorship Summer 2023.

title: Summer of Bitcoin 2023
description: Three students from the club namely Prakhar Agarwal, Aditya Sharma and Lakshya Singh got accepted as mentees in Summer of Bitcoin 2023.

title: Google Summer of Code 2023
description: 16 students from the club got accepted in Google Summer of Code (GSOC) and a total of 22 students including other open source programmes.

title: Summer of Reproducibility 2023
description: Two students from the club namely Srishti Jaiswal and Krishna Madhwani got accepted as mentees in Summer of Reproducibility 2023.

title: LFX Mentorship 2023 Spring
description: Three students from the club namely Ankur Patil, Paarth Agarwal and Yash Raj got accepted as mentees in LFX Mentorship Spring 2023.

title: 11th Inter IIT Tech Meet
description: 2 teams, of 10 and 8 members respectively, participated and won gold and silver medals in their respective events of Grow Simplee and ConsenSys' MetaMask Snap Development Hackathon against the participating 22 IITs.

title: LFX Mentorship 2022 Fall
description: Three students from the club namely Nishant Mittal, Lali Akhil Raj and Soumik Dutta got accepted as mentees in LFX Mentorship Fall 2022.

title: Google Summer of Code 2022
description: 24 students from the club got accepted in one of the most prestigious open-source software development programs - Google Summer of Code. 3 students were selected as mentors while 1 student is now an org admin.

title: Outreachy 2022
description: Sanyu Daver was selected as an Outreachy Fellow for the summer

title: Summer of Bitcoin 2022
description: 3 students namely Shreyansh Yadav, Ankur Patil and Prakhar Saxena were selected as mentees under Summer of Bitcoin

title: 10th Inter IIT Tech Meet
description: A team of 7 members participated in Mercari Large Scale System Design Hackathon and won a Silver Medal aganist the participating 22 IITs

title: LFX Mentorship Fall 2021
description: Two students from the club (Lakshya Singh and Nithish Kartik) got accepted as mentees in LFX Mentorship Fall 2021.

title: Google Summer of Code 2021
description: 23 students from the club got accepted in one of the most prestigious open-source software development programs - Google Summer of Code.IIT (BHU) is the institute with second highest GSoC selections in the world in 2021.

title: Open Source Fellowships
description: One student from the club got accepted in Microsoft Reinforcement Learning Open Source Fest. Two students got accepted as mentees in LFX Mentorship.
linkdes: Microsoft Reinforcement Learning Open Source Fest.

title: 9th Inter IIT Tech Meet
description: 2 teams, of 5 and 7 members respectively, participated and won gold and silver medals in their respective events of Network Security Hackathon and Automatic Headline And Sentiment Generator against the participating 23 IITs.

title: Google Summer of Code 2020
description: Ten students from the club successfully completed a project in one of the most prestigious open-source software development programs - Google Summer of Code. IIT (BHU) is one of top 10 institutes in the world with most number of GSoC selections in 2020.

title: Google Summer of Code 2019
description: Nine students from the club got selected for one of the most prestigious open-source software development programs - Google Summer of Code.

title: 7th Inter IIT Tech Meet 2018, IIT Bombay
description: 2 teams, of 4 members each, participated and both won bronze medals on their respective events of Coding Hackathon and Star Cluster Identifier against the participating 23 IITs.

title: Google Summer of Code 2018
description: Seven students from the club got selected for one of the most prestigious open-source software development programs - Google Summer of Code.

title: COPS Summer Camp 2018
description: COPS organized a two months long Summer Camp online. More than 500 students across the country participated. The camp covered all the three major domains of Computer Science, namely Competitive Programming, Machine Learning and Development (Android and Web).

title: Microsoft Code.Fun.Do 2018
description: COPS organized Microsoft Code Fun Do, a 24 hr onsite hackathon which saw a prticipation of more than 150 teams (teams of 3).

title: Bronze at Inter-IIT
description: A team of two members, Suyash Shukla and Abhinav Patel, won Bronze Medal in an Inter IIT Event.

title: Won GS Quantify 2017
description: A team of three senior members, Bharat Khanna, Ishank Arora and Ayush Kedia, won the GS Quantify contest held by Goldman Sachs. Also, 6 teams from the institute were selected as Significant Contributors.
